definition: surname Song/the Song dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)

Four great compilations of Northern Song dynasty, namely: Extensive records of the Taiping era (978) 太平廣記|太平广记, Imperial readings of the Taiping era 太平御覽|太平御览, Prime tortoise of the record bureau 冊府元龜|册府元龟, Finest blossoms in the garden of literature 文苑英華|文苑英华
pinyin: Bei3 Song4 si4 da4 bu4 shu1

sentences.english: North Sung, Lung-chuan is the green porcelain of southern Chinese most to produce a base.
sentences.chinese: 北宋时，龙泉是中国南方最主要的青瓷生产基地。

sentences.english: Jiao Fang took charge of entertainment music, while Da Sheng Fu served as an official administrative structure.
sentences.chinese: 大晟府成立于北宋末年，是朝廷正式的音乐管理机构。

sentences.english: Among them, the evolving of North-song Zaju is a typical case.
sentences.chinese: 其中北宋杂剧的演变最具有典型意义。

sentences.english: The Ding Kiln porcelain appears at first in the Five Kingdoms period in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 定窑瓷最初出现在五代时期，盛于北宋初。

sentences.english: Middle and Late Northern Song Dynasty carved exquisite decoration, unique style.
sentences.chinese: 北宋中晚期刻花装饰精美绝伦，独具一格。

sentences.english: The Northern Song to Jin, who are said Lishi County is the state stone.
sentences.chinese: 北宋至金，县名俱称离石，属石州。

sentences.english: Since the late Tang and Northern Song Dynasties, people have begun to call Wei Yingwu the poet of landscape and pastoral.
sentences.chinese: 自唐末北宋以来，人们开始称韦应物为山水田园诗人。

sentences.english: The poet Zhang Xian in the Beisong Dynasty is famous for describing the simulacrum.
sentences.chinese: 北宋词人张先以善于写影而著称。

sentences.english: In Northern song Dynasty Yu's Xiangzhouji was still preserved, while it was lost in Southern Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 庾所作《湘州记》在北宋犹存于世，南宋时亡佚。

sentences.english: Shen Kuo was an outstanding patriot in the North Song dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 沈括是北宋一位出色的爱国者。

sentences.english: When Gen Yue was completed, North Song dynasty also died out.
sentences.chinese: 然而，当艮岳筑成之时，北宋王朝也走向了灭亡。

sentences.english: The Northern Song official kiln was located in Bianliang.
sentences.chinese: 北宋官窑客观存在，地点在汴京。

sentences.english: The Outer city wall is rhomboid, with the result of "Renpan" location.
sentences.chinese: 北宋外城平面呈菱形，应是当时“人盘”定位的结果。

sentences.english: Before that time, navigators determined directions by looking at the positions of the sun, the moon and the stars.
sentences.chinese: 北宋前，航海者是利用日月星辰的位置来判定方向。

sentences.english: The art of Chinese traditional opera in Jiaozuo Area was formed in Song Dynasty and perfect in Yuan and Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 焦作地区的戏曲艺术形成于北宋，完备于元明。

sentences.english: The rising and fading of the Xikun style had close relation with the Imperial Examination.
sentences.chinese: 西昆体的兴衰，和北宋进士考试的关系极其密切。

definition: the Song dynasty (960-1279)/refers to the Northern (960-1127) and Southern Song (1128-1279)
Song Dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
Tang of the Five Southern Dynasties 937-975
Five Dynasties (907-960) and Ten Kingdoms (902-979), period of political turmoil in ancient China
Jin Dynasty (1115-1234), founded by the Jurchen 女真[Nu:3 zhen1] people of North China, a precursor of the Mongol Yuan Dynasty
Song dynasty (960-1279)/used to distinguish it from 劉宋|刘宋 Song of Southern dynasties (420-479)
late Ming/first half of the 17th century
